text: These support costs are a big drain on America's dollar reserves. Dr. Adenauer's answer is the once-and-for-all cash offer of 357million. President Kennedy's rejection of it is a painful blow to the West German Government. It will now have to pay more and increase taxation to do so or run the obvious risks in upsetting the new American administration.
